attributes.action: Not Sign The European Convention on pet animals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IF This Convention is signed it will cause the extintion of the many diverse breeds ( often Rare) of animals, including rare breed poultry, pigeons, rabbits, dogs and cats.If this was aimed at wild life there would be a world wide outcry.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Not Sign The European Convention on pet animals."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15311.asp

Prime Minister's Office
